description: VIA Rail Canada is looking for an Application Tracking System Solution
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Application Tracking System (ATS)

**Reference Number:** MX-42944284460
**Solicitation Number:** 202311018
**Publication Date:** November 16, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** January 10, 2024 at 14:00:00
**Amendment Number:** 4

VIA Rail Canada Inc. invites qualified vendors to submit bids for the implementation of an Application Tracking System (ATS) solution. The selected vendor will provide a cloud-based digital platform that enables the recruitment of top talent and facilitates the hiring process.

**Key Requirements:**

* The solution must be available in both English and French.
* Data hosting must be in Canada.
* The solution must be accessible on mobile devices.
* The solution must be minimally compliant with Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0AA.
* The vendor must have a minimum of three (3) years of experience in ATS solution services and implementation for organizations similar in size and type to VIA Rail Canada.

**Timeline:**

* The selected vendor must make the solution functional within 180 calendar days after contract signature.

**Contact Information:**

* Contact Name: Lydia St-Louis
* Email: [lydia_st-louis@viarail.ca](mailto:lydia_st-louis@viarail.ca)

**Notice URL:**

* English: https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2688434455/abstract?language=EN
* French: https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2688434455/abstract?language=FR

**Bi-Lingual Requirements:**

* The vendor must be able to provide services in both Canada's official languages.
* The solution must be available in both English and French.

**Important Documents:**

* Tender documents are available on the Merx website (http://www.merx.com).

Please note that this tender announcement is for information purposes only and does not constitute an invitation to bid. Application forms and tender documents must be submitted electronically through the Merx website. For more information on how to bid, please refer to the tender documents and the Merx website.
